name: No Bounds
description:
Climb, scramble and jump your way through the heights of the city life in this game of calculated trajectory.

Play as a raccoon seeking out it's prized cake awaiting them at the top.

Be careful, make one wrong move and it could cost you!

*** Current bug where if a new game is started or a previous save is resumed the character can't move, simply pause the game and resume should fix the issue.

Music and sound from zapsplat.com.
